value:
This land's fruits grow in every color
possible. What a paradise!

Eirika was right—this ocean is quite
pleasant... Alas, training calls!

I thought it would a great feat of
strength to swim in full plate, but
Innes and Tana put a stop to that...

Running through the sand is a superb
way to firm up those legs. How about
it, $Nu?

I want Eirika to be free of her cares
while we are here. I'll train twice as
hard for the both of us!

I'm Ephraim, the prince of Renais.
Here you are—a sampling of the sea's
bounty from $Nf.

What, the heat? This is nothing. If I
gave up now, Eirika would never let
me hear the end of it!

Even if we are blown over by raging
waves, I'm sure we will weather the
storm!

I guess I overlooked the strength of
the sun's rays...

This season seems perfect for
training. I can only hope my efforts
bear some fruit!

I'm Ephraim. I had planned to relax
but... who can turn down so many
perfect opportunities to train?

Do you remember when I told you of
my dream to become the greatest
spearman in all of Magvel?$k$pPerfecting the craft is only a small
part. My true dream lies in traveling
the world as a warrior for hire.$k$pNever choosing your destination, just
following where the fighting leads...
It's imperative you learn to adapt.$k$pYou may be required in a dark forest,
on a cliff face, or even on a sandy
beach like this one...$k$pThat's why it's so important for me to
be out of my element like this. The
training possibilities are endless!$k$pMe? Relax? Don't worry about that,
just being here has done my spirit a
world of good! Now, excuse me...$k$pI think I have a few more laps in me
before my arms give out!
Let's see who can swim faster!
I'll sink you!
Wherever, whenever!
Oh, look, there are fish here!
It's...too hot...
I'm Ephraim. I think I'll have an enjoyable vacation if you're there too.
*start* Ugh, cease your foolish games and hand me my drink normally.
The beach is nice. It's a good place to strengthen your legs.
Eirika is here too? I hope she's not running wild.
Hmm... So we're going to play a game where we smash that big round fruit? All right. Sounds like fun!
My petty worries seem pretty meaningless when I gaze out over the open ocean...
I must do whatever I can to make this summer special since you're here.
It's so bright out!
Are you ready?
Let me dive in!
